name.baseName: Single Rare Earth Oxide / Single Rare Earth Carbonate / Single Rare Earth Chloride ; Southern ionic rare earth concentrates ; Hydrochloric acid dissolution + P507/naphthenic acid (non-ammonia soap) extraction and separation ; All sizes; NESPS2
单一稀土氧化物/单一稀土碳酸盐/单一稀土氯化物 ; 南方离子型稀土精矿 ; 盐酸溶解+P508/环烷酸（非氨皂）萃取分离 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management84

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management84
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所述工艺用于提取和分离稀土元素，特别是从南方离子型稀土精矿生产单一稀土氧化物、碳酸盐和氯化物。该方法涉及将精矿溶解在盐酸中，然后通过P507/环烷酸（非氨皂）萃取。这种高纯度产物对于需要精确物质属性的各种高科技行业至关重要，包括电子、磁铁和催化剂行业。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码3232文件，在完整版文件中第5117页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Single Rare Earth Oxide，Single Rare Earth Carbonate，Single Rare Earth Chloride

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为单一稀土氧化物/单一稀土碳酸盐/单一稀土氯化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management84
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是化学沉淀法，其效率为84，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设施年运行时间（小时）/企业年正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量
